name: Derived Grade
title: Derived Grade
rows: WHO Grade I: Circumscribed tumors of low proliferative potential associated with the possibility of cure following resection
WHO Grade II: Infiltrative tumors with low proliferative potential with increased risk of progression or recurrence
WHO Grade III: Tumors with histologic and/or molecular genetic evidence of malignancy that are associated with an aggressive clinical course
WHO Grade IV: Tumors with histologic and/or molecular genetic evidence of malignancy that are associated with the most aggressive clinical course and shorter overall survival
